title: discavo integrated on urlaubspiraten
description: We have integrated the hotel searching service discavo.de on urlaubspiraten.de

details.title: discavo integrated on urlaubspiraten
details.description: Urlaubspiraten need no introduction as trusted travel offer aggregator. We developed the discavo.de widget that allows visitors of urlaubspiraten.de to find the ideal accomodation through discavo.de. The widget look and feel is configurable and enables tracking user clicks on google analytics or other tools.

title: émouvance
description: We created a fresh website for the music label emouvance.com. The music label founded by double bass player Claude Tchamitchian, is based in Marseille - France, producing music and organizing festivals since 20 years.

details.title: émouvance
details.description: We have developed the emouvance.com web site to look fresh and elegant, resonating the spirit of their music. The site is multilingual, SEO optimized and features a user friendly backend that enables non technical users to easily update its content.

title: discavo.de
description: DISCAVO is the new hotel price comparison platform that takes the pain out of travel search. The platform offers user-friendly filter options that are revolutionizing the search for suitable accommodation. Travelers choose their destination and find the nearest location within the chosen price range. Dynamic maps allow visitors to explore the surroundings.

details.title: Discavo Mobile Site
details.description: DISCAVO is the new hotel price comparison platform that takes the pain out of travel search. Wanted Pixel developed a fully functional mobile version of the DISCAVO service within just one month.The platform offers user-friendly filter options that are revolutionizing the search for suitable accommodation. Travelers choose their destination and find the nearest location within the chosen price range. Dynamic maps allow visitors to explore the surroundings.Under the hood the platform is powered by the Play! framework, AngularJS and HTML5 WebSockets. It is hosted on the Amazon Cloud.

title: gigflip.com
description: Gigflip enables Fanbooking for music events, bridging the gap between artists, booking agencies and fans. On gigflip, artists plan concerts according to demand, minimizing financial risks through a unique direct dialogue with their fan-base. Fans collectively decide in which city the next gig of their favorite artist will take place.

details.title: Gigflip web app - e commerce
details.description: Gigflip enables Fanbooking for music events, bridging the gap between artists, booking agencies and fans. On gigflip, artists plan concerts according to demand, minimizing financial risks through a unique direct dialogue with their fan-base. Fans collectively decide in which city the next gig of their favorite artist will take place.In technical terms, the platform is a Ruby on Rails application hosted on the Amazon cloud, offering live votings, concert ticket issuing, integration with Twitter / Facebook, credit card payments and a sophisticated administration back-end.

title: arzttermine.de on Gelbe Seiten
description: We designed and developed a complete solution that allows visitors of Gelbe Seiten to book a doctor appointment without leaving the Gelbe Seiten portal. The actual appointment booking is a service offered by our client arzttermine.de.

details.title: INTEGRATION OF ARZTTERMINE.DE ON GELBE SEITEN.
details.description:
We designed and developed a complete solution that allows visitors of Gelbe Seiten to book a doctor appointment without leaving the Gelbe Seiten portal. The actual appointment booking is a service offered by our client arzttermine.de.
In business terms, the solution is a white label widget that integrates the arzttermine.de service on any third party portal. The look and feel of the widget is customizable, to enable seamless integration and serve the particular needs of each partnership between arzttermine and the third party portal. Right now the following integrations are online:
  • gelbeseiten.de
  • mux.de
  • netdoktor.de
  • portal-der-frauen.de
  • chirurgie-portal.de
  • portal-der-zahnmedizin.de

title: Arzttermine
description: Find an available doctor in your area and book an appointment on your iPhone, with Arzttermine.de. Wanted Pixel has updated the iPhone app of Arzttermine.de with new features, usability and design improvements.

details.title: ARZTTERMINE MOBILE APP
details.description:
Find an available doctor in your area and book an appointment with the Arzttermine.de iPhone Application.
Designed and implemented by Wanted Pixel, the app is user friendly and efficient.

title: Arzttermine
description: Find an available doctor in your area and book an appointment with arzttermine.de. Wanted Pixel has updated arzttermine.de web app with new features working both on frontend and backend.

details.title: ARZTTERMINE WEB APP
details.description: Find an available doctor in your area and book an appointment with arzttermine.de. Wanted Pixel has updated arzttermine.de web app with new features working both on frontend and backend. The new platform independent mobile site developed by Wanted Pixel is now online: m.arzttermine.de.

title: StrategyVaR
description: StrategyVaR Associates LLP is an energy risk consulting firm, delivering innovative risk management software, advisory services and bespoke IT work. Design and implementation made by Wanted Pixel. How cool is the parallax effect?

details.title: STRATEGYVAR
details.description: Wantedpixel designed and developed the new website of StrategyVaR. Pay attention on the parallax effect sliding of the pages. There is also a news section.

title: K-NAP
description: K-NAP is a hand-made furniture design brand. Wanted Pixel crafted their web presence.

details.title: K-NAP
details.description: K-nap unique, elegant and innovative furniture is hand-made in France. Their attitude is reflected on the simple and fresh design of their website created by Wanted Pixel. The site includes multilingual functionality, a usable press section and background graphics that resize to fit to browser windows of any size.

title: CADOLLE
description: Maison Cadolle is happy to share with you, after over 120 years of experience, its collections of lingerie, corsetry, and other sweet things. We are also happy to be part of Cadolle's history, creating the new website.

details.title: CADOLLE
details.description: Cadolle is the brand that actually invented the bra in the 1880s. For more than a century Cadolle pioneer in creating luxury lingerie. Wanted Pixel designed the brand`s new website to look classic yet current, discreetly framing and revealing the beauty of Cadolle creations.

title: ART-FI
description: ART-FI is offering expert services in the field of electro magnetics, antenna design and 3D EM Simulation. Their new website created by Wanted Pixel points suggest professionalism and high-tech.

details.title: ART-Fi
details.description: ART-FI is offering expert services in the field of electro magnetics, antenna design and 3D EM Simulation. Wanted Pixel has created a web design with high tech looks. Design and typesetting simplicity reveal the professionalism of the brand while shades of blue suggest wave-fields. This is an on-going project with many more features to come including live video streaming, customers area, blog...

title: Redmine TU Berlin
description: Maintaining a suite of services based on the Redmine Open Source Project management software integrated in the IT infrastructure of the Usability Lab at Deutsche Telekom Laboratories - TU Berlin.

details.title: ART-Fi
details.description: Our mission has been to optimize Project Management and Communication within the Usability Lab at Deutsche Telekom Laboratories - TU Berlin. Wanted Pixel supports and maintains a set of tools that help formalizing practices and processes for collaboration and in-house software creation within the Laboratory. The solution is based to the Redmine Open Source system, delivering progress tracking, bug reporting, wiki, progress reports, source code revision control with Git and Subversion, Gantt charts and calendar generation. Wanted Pixel supports and maintains the system and its integration in the laboratory's IT infrastructure.
